excerpt.rendered:
Enjoy the drama and romance of this lavish loveseat, featuring Chesterfield-inspired tufting along the back and seat cushion, linen-like oatmeal upholstery, and stunning nailhead detailing. This piece infuses any room with luxury while accent pillows ensure exceptional comfort. Combine with other pieces in the collection to fill your home with regal luxury that impresses family and friends.
  • Modern Transitional Design: Modern transitional design provides tremendous aesthetic versatility to be used within virtually any interior home décor.
  • Superb Material: VELVET UPHOLSTERY, velvet creates a rich and luxurious feel.
  • Sturdy and craftsmanship: Constructed with a superb wood frame it is sturdy and durable; each process of making a sofa focuses on perfection almost exacting.

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
